Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
01.07.2014 SH SCR18919 WKA payments: Added test on unfinshed jobs (table JOBL)
26.01.2014 GB SCR18670 Replaced use of GSET by GSBU
29.12.2013 GB SCR18605 Added task rct.JOBL
05.08.2013 SH SCR18322 Changed BPH110.PI.COUNTRY = blank to 'NL'
07.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
20.11.2011 GB SCR16873 Added update the V.TIME with GSET_TIME (GSET_ID = 268) if PI.DATEIN <> PO.DATEOUT
06.11.2011 GB SCR16873 Removed the condition If V.DATE <> date () if the BPH110 is called
10.11.2010 SH SCR15936 Added PI.RUNNUMBER and extended the submit of BPH220
for single statements
25.10.2010 SH SCR15905 Fixed parameter BPH110 mismatch (v:TIME was passed
instead of v.DATE)
09.06.2010 SH SCR15576 Removed GB701 date/time parameter to submit
BPH220 for normal payments
-- Normal payments
-- WKA payments
-- Single statement (if button 'Try again' is pressed in OPH302)
-- Multiple bank account statements, case BPH300 is processed
-- One bank account statement if button "Try again" is pressed in
-- Start BPH220 if end of process (bankfile handling) or if maximum
number of statements which have to be processed by BPH220 is reached
... check for unfinshed job
-- Start BPH220 if end of process (bankfile handling) or if maximum
number of statements which have to be processed by BPH220 is reached
-- Schedule WKA payments in the future
-- If PI.DATEIN <> PO.DATEOUT then set V.TIME = GSET_TIME (GSET_ID = 268)
-- Handling one bank account statement if button "Try again" is pressed in

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/JOBL where JOBL_PROGRAMCODE = 'BPH220' and JOBL_DATESUBMITTED = ':2' and JOBL_WORKSTATUS <> 'END' and JOBL_PARAMETERS like '%:3%' for fetch only
select count(*) from :1/JOBL where JOBL_PROGRAMCODE = 'BPH220' and JOBL_PARAMETERS like '%:2%' for fetch only
